bs-socialblog-type: Label for option "blog" in entry field "type"
bs-socialblog-entityblog-header-create: Header for a blog entry, that is not yet existing{{Identical|New Blog}}
bs-socialblog-entityblog-header:
{{notranslate}}
Headline for a "blog" entry. Must link to special page [[Special:Blog/$3|Special:Blog/$3]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Title of the blog entry
bs-socialblog-entityblog-content-more-bt:
Short label for button that expands the content of the blog entry.
{{Identical|More}}

Short label for button that shrinks the content of the blog entry to a teaser.
{{Identical|Less}}
bs-socialblog-toc-useblogteaser: User option in [[Special:Preferences]] that allowes the user to de-/activate, that expandable teaser text is used for blog entries in the timeline
bs-socialblog-special-blog-heading:
{{doc-special}}
Special page header for [[Special:Blog]] special page.
bs-socialblog-special-blog-heading-entry:
Special page header for [[Special:Blog]] special page when a single blog entry parameter is given as a subpage.
* $1 - Title of the blog entry
bs-social-notifications-blog-create: Short message when blog is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
bs-social-notifications-email-blog-creat: Email subject when blog is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
Email body message when blog is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name, $4 - Text of the blog
bs-social-notifications-web-blog-create-: Web message when blog is created. For now, its empty, because there are no more information to show than already in header message. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
bs-social-notifications-blog-edit: Short message when blog is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
bs-social-notifications-email-blog-edit-: Email subject when blog is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
Email body message when blog is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name, $4 - Text of the blog
bs-social-notifications-web-blog-edit-bo: Web message when blog is edited. For now, its empty, because there are no more information to show than already in header message. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
bs-social-notifications-blog-delete: Short message when blog is deleted. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
bs-social-notifications-email-blog-delet: Email subject when blog is edited. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
Email body message when blog is created. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
bs-social-notifications-web-blog-delete-: Web message when blog is deleted. For now, its empty, because there are no more information to show than already in header message. $1 - username, $2 - user realname, $3 - Blog name
bs-social-notification-blog-primary-link: Label for primary link button, leading to blog page
